programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Lisa And The Devil [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

programme.title: The Ninth Configuration
programme.desc: A military psychiatrist takes charge of an army mental hospital situated in a secluded castle filled with eccentric patients.

programme.title: Backlot
programme.sub-title: Backlot: Humanoids From The Deep: Interview With Roger Corman
programme.desc: Interviews with Roger Corman, second unit/assistant director James Sbardellati, composer James Horner and Cindy Weintraub

programme.title: Howling V: The Rebirth
programme.desc: A group of strangers visit an ancient Hungarian castle and bring along a werewolf.

programme.title: Twins of Evil
programme.desc: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

programme.title: Wishcraft
programme.desc: Bret eceives a strange box in the mail. A note tells him it will give him three wishes, but just as his new life is beginning, someone is murdering the popular kids in strange, inventive ways.

programme.title: The Devil's Rain
programme.desc: A satanist cult leader is burnt alive by the local church. He vows to come back to hunt down and enslave every descendant of his congregation.

programme.title: Q: The Winged Serpent
programme.desc: Its name is Quetzalcoatl, a dragon-like Aztec god that is summoned to modern-day Manhattan by a mysterious cult.

programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Black Sunday [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

programme.title: The Night Of The Sorcerers [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An African expedition encounters vampires at the site of an ancient sacrificial altar.

programme.title: Howling VI: The Freaks
programme.desc: A villainous carnival owner traps a young werewolf to include in his growing menagerie of inhuman exhibits.

programme.title: Frankie Freako
programme.desc: After calling a late-night party hotline that promises out-of-this-world fun, uptight yuppie Conor must battle the pint-sized forces of evil that get unleashed through his phone line

programme.title: Hush [B&W Shush Cut]
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writemust fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.
